articles.title: Merck asks FDA to authorize antiviral Covid pill for emergency use - CNBC
articles.description: The Covid-19 treatment – known as molnupiravir – could be available to Americans by late this year.
articles.content:
Merck said Monday it asked the Food and Drug Administration to authorize emergency use of its experimental antiviral pill to treat mild-to-moderate Covid-19 in adults.

articles.title: Ezért adták meg Mbappé vitatott gólját - Goal.com
articles.description: On the four-year anniversary of the lowest point in USMNT history, the Americans suffered their first loss in CONCACAF World Cup qualifying and for the first time ever it came against Panama.

articles.title: Check Out Martina Navratilova’s Viral Reaction to Amit Shah Praising PM Modi - The Quint
